name: Life of a Water Droplet
description:
Experience the life of a water droplet whose been trampled his entire life. Enter Billy who wants to exact revenge on humans who has been mean to him!

Undergo the stages of evaporation, condensation and precipitation and fire down rain on those pesky humans!

A Game brought to you by NUS students:

Producer :Rachel Sin Sze Min & Zheng Fei Han, Alrissa

Concept Art: Eng Chu Yi

Programmer & Designer : Johan Ng Zi Qi & Vashon Tnee Rihao
